verses.PSA.4.6: Na wò mo ƒe kekeli naklẽ ɖe mía dzi, O! Yehowa.
verses.PSA.4.7: kple wain yeye do agbogbo na.
verses.PSA.4.8: elabena wò, Yehowa, koe na mele dedie.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la. Woadzii kple kpẽ.
verses.PSA.5.2: elabena wòe mele gbe dom ɖa na.
verses.PSA.5.4: wò la, ame vɔ̃ɖiwo mate ŋu anɔ gbɔwò o.
verses.PSA.5.5: elabena èlé fu nu vlo wɔlawo katã.
verses.PSA.5.7: Matsɔ bubu ade ta agu ɖe wò gbedoxɔ kɔkɔe la ŋgɔ.
verses.PSA.5.8: eye wɔ wò mɔwo dzɔdzɔe le ŋkunye me.
verses.PSA.5.9: eye wotsɔa woƒe aɖe gblɔa alakpanyawoe.
verses.PSA.5.11: ale be ame siwo lɔ̃ wò ŋkɔ la natso aseye le mewò.
verses.PSA.5.12: eye nètsɔa wò amenuveve ƒoa xlã wo abe akpoxɔnu ene.

verses.PSA.6.1: alo ahe to nam le wò dɔmedzoe helĩhelĩ me o.
verses.PSA.6.2: O! Yehowa, yɔ dɔm, elabena nye ƒuwo le veve sem.
verses.PSA.6.3: va se ɖe ɣe ka ɣi?
verses.PSA.6.4: ɖem, le wò lɔlɔ̃ si meʋãna o la ta.
verses.PSA.6.5: Ame kae kafua wò tso eƒe yɔdo me?
verses.PSA.6.6: eye nye aɖatsi wɔe be nye dɔƒe ƒo tsi belebele.
verses.PSA.6.7: womegale nu kpɔm tututu o, le nye futɔwo ta.
verses.PSA.6.9: Yehowa xɔ nye gbedodoɖa alɔ eve.
verses.PSA.6.10: woagbugbɔ ɖe megbe enumake kple ŋukpe.

verses.PSA.7.1: xɔ nam, eye nàɖem tso ame siwo katã le yonyeme tim la ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.7.3: ne mewɔ nu sia, eye vɔ̃ lé ɖe nye asiwo ŋu,
verses.PSA.7.4: alo meda adzo nye futɔ naneke mawɔmawɔtɔe la,
verses.PSA.7.5: eye wòana matsi ke me adɔ.
verses.PSA.7.6: Nyɔ, nye Mawu, ne nàɖo ʋɔnu dzɔdzɔe dɔdrɔ̃ anyi.
verses.PSA.7.7: Ɖu fia ɖe wo dzi tso dziƒo;
verses.PSA.7.8: O! Dziƒoʋĩtɔ, tso afia nam le nye nuteƒewɔwɔ ta.
verses.PSA.7.10: ame si ɖea ame si dza le eƒe dzi me.
verses.PSA.7.11: Mawu si ɖea eƒe dɔmedzoe fiana gbe sia gbe.
verses.PSA.7.13: eye eƒe aŋutrɔ bibiawo la etrɔ asi le wo ŋu wosɔ gbe.
verses.PSA.7.16: eye eƒe ŋutasesẽ atrɔ ava eya ŋutɔ ƒe ta dzi.
verses.PSA.7.17: eye madzi kafukafuha na Yehowa Dziƒoʋĩtɔ la ƒe ŋkɔ.

verses.PSA.8.2: nàmia nu na futɔ kple hlɔ̃biala la.
verses.PSA.8.3: nu siwo nètsɔ ɖo wo nɔƒee la,
verses.PSA.8.4: kple amegbetɔvi be nèléa be nɛ?
verses.PSA.8.5: eye nètsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe kple bubu ɖɔ nɛ.
verses.PSA.8.6: eye nètsɔ nu sia nu de eƒe afɔ te.
verses.PSA.8.8: le atsiaƒu me la le eƒe kpɔkplɔ te.
verses.PSA.8.9: aleke wò ŋkɔ ƒe gãnyenye yɔ anyigba katã dzi ale!

verses.PSA.9.2: O Dziƒoʋĩtɔ, madzi kafukafuhawo na wò ŋkɔ.
verses.PSA.9.3: wokli nu, eye wo katã wotsrɔ̃ le ŋkuwò me.
verses.PSA.9.4: Ènɔ wò fiazikpui dzi, eye nèdrɔ̃ ʋɔnu dzɔdzɔe.
verses.PSA.9.5: woƒe ŋkɔwo ɖa tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me.
verses.PSA.9.6: eye womagaɖo ŋku wo dzi gɔ̃ hã akpɔ gbeɖe o.
verses.PSA.9.7: eɖo eƒe fiazikpui anyi hena ʋɔnudɔdrɔ̃.
verses.PSA.9.8: akplɔ dukɔwo katã le nuteƒewɔwɔ me.
verses.PSA.9.10: megble ame siwo dia wò la ɖi kpɔ o.
verses.PSA.9.11: miɖe gbeƒã nu siwo wòwɔ la le dukɔwo dome.
verses.PSA.9.12: ɖoa ŋku edzi, medoa toku hiãtɔwo ƒe ɣlidodo o.
verses.PSA.9.13: Kpɔ nye nublanui, eye nàkɔm tso ku ƒe agbowo me,
verses.PSA.9.14: eye le afi ma matso aseye le ɖeɖe si nènam la ta.
verses.PSA.9.15: woƒe afɔwo ɖo ɖɔ si woawo ŋutɔ woɖo ɖi le bebeme la me.
verses.PSA.9.17: nenema kee nye dukɔ siwo ŋlɔ Mawu be.
verses.PSA.9.18: alo ame si le fu kpem la, mɔkpɔkpɔ nabu ɖee o.
verses.PSA.9.19: na woadrɔ̃ ʋɔnu dukɔwo le ŋkuwò me.
verses.PSA.9.20: na dukɔwo nanya be amegbetɔwo yewonye.

verses.PSA.10.1: Nu ka ta nèɣla ɖokuiwò le xaxaɣiwo ɖo?
verses.PSA.10.2: ke wògena ɖe mɔ si wòtre da ɖi la me.
verses.PSA.10.3: eyraa ŋuklẽlawo, eye wòɖea alɔme le Yehowa ŋu.
verses.PSA.10.5: eye wòɖoa hehe ɖe eƒe futɔwo ta.
verses.PSA.10.6: makpɔ dzidzɔ ɣe sia ɣi, eye nyemage ɖe dzɔgbevɔ̃e me akpɔ o.”
verses.PSA.10.7: eye gbegblẽ kple nu vɔ̃ɖi le eƒe aɖe te.
verses.PSA.10.8: eye wòtsa ŋu na ame si wòalé le bebeme.
verses.PSA.10.9: eléa amemanɔsitɔ, eye wòhea wo ɖe eƒe ɖɔ me dzonae.
verses.PSA.10.10: woƒe mo tsyɔa zi, eye womuna dzea anyi le eƒe ŋusẽ te.
verses.PSA.10.11: “Mawu ŋlɔ be; etsɔ nu tsyɔ eƒe mo, eye mele nu kpɔm o.”
verses.PSA.10.14: elabena wòe nye xɔnametɔ na tsyɔ̃eviwo.
verses.PSA.10.15: ame aɖeke mekpɔe o la ŋuti.
verses.PSA.10.16: dukɔwo atsrɔ̃ ɖa le eƒe anyigba dzi.
verses.PSA.10.17: ède dzi ƒo na wo, eye nèɖo to woƒe ɣlidodo.
verses.PSA.10.18: ale be amegbetɔ si nye anyi la magado ŋɔdzi na amewo azɔ o.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.11.1: “Dzo abe xevi ene nàyi ɖe wò to dzi?
verses.PSA.11.2: woada ame siwo dza le woƒe dzi me la le blukɔ me.
verses.PSA.11.6: ame vɔ̃ɖiwo dzi, eye ya xɔdzo anye wo tɔ gome.
verses.PSA.11.7: ame siwo dza le woƒe dzi me la akpɔ eƒe ŋkume.

verses.PSA.12.1: eye nuteƒewɔlawo bu le amegbetɔwo dome.
verses.PSA.12.3: kple aɖe siwo doa wo ɖokui ɖe dzi
verses.PSA.12.4: ame kae aɖu amegã ɖe mía dzi?”
verses.PSA.12.5: Maɖe wo tso ame siwo le vlo dom wo la ƒe asi me.”
verses.PSA.12.6: eye wòdza zi gbɔ zi adre la ene.
verses.PSA.12.7: eye wodea bubu yakanuwɔwɔwo ŋu le amegbetɔwo dome.
verses.PSA.12.8: eye àdzɔ mía ŋu tso ame siawo tɔgbi ƒe asi me tegbetegbe.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.13.1: Va se ɖe ɣe ka ɣi nàɣla wò ŋkume ɖem?
verses.PSA.13.2: Va se ɖe ɣe ka ɣi nye futɔwo aɖu dzinye?
verses.PSA.13.4: “Meɖu edzi,” eye nye ketɔwo akpɔ dzidzɔ ne medze anyi.
verses.PSA.13.5: nye dzi le aseye tsom le wò xɔname ŋuti.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.14.1: ame ɖeka hɔ̃ɔ hã mele wo dome si wɔa nu nyui o.
verses.PSA.14.3: ɖeka pɛ gɔ̃ hã meli o.
verses.PSA.14.4: eye womeyɔa Yehowa o la manya esia oa?
verses.PSA.14.5: elabena Mawu le ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe hame.
verses.PSA.14.7: na Yakob natso aseye, eye Israel nakpɔ dzidzɔ!

verses.PSA.15.1: Ame kae anɔ wò togbɛ kɔkɔe la dzi?
verses.PSA.15.2: Ame si toa nyateƒe tso eƒe dzi me ke
verses.PSA.15.3: eye meƒoa ɖi nɔvia amegbetɔ o,

verses.None: David ƒe ha si wɔa dɔ ɖe ame dzi.
verses.PSA.16.2: nu nyui aɖeke mele asinye kpe ɖe ŋuwò o.”
verses.PSA.16.3: siwo ƒe nu nyoa ŋunye vevie.
verses.PSA.16.5: èna nye gomekpɔkpɔ le dedie nam.
verses.PSA.16.6: le nyateƒe me la, domenyinu si do dzidzɔ nam la su asinye.
verses.PSA.16.7: le zã me ke hã, nye dzi xlɔ̃a num.
verses.PSA.16.8: elabena ele nye nuɖusime, eya ta nyemavɔ̃ o.
verses.PSA.16.9: nye aɖe tso aseye, eye nye ŋutilã hã agbɔ ɖe eme le dedinɔnɔ me,

verses.PSA.17.2: eye na wò ŋkuwo nakpɔ nu si le dzɔdzɔe.
verses.PSA.17.3: Meɖoe kplikpaa be nye nu mawɔ nu vɔ̃ o.
verses.PSA.17.4: nyemage ɖe ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe mɔwo dzi o.
verses.PSA.17.6: ƒu to anyi ɖe ŋunye, eye nàse nye gbedodoɖa.
verses.PSA.17.7: tso woƒe futɔwo ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.17.8: eye nàɣlam ɖe wò aʋala ƒe vɔvɔli te,
verses.PSA.17.9: kple futɔ siwo ɖe to ɖem la ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.17.10: eye wotsɔa woƒe nuwo gblɔa dadanyawoe.
verses.PSA.17.11: woƒe ŋkuwo le te ne woaxlãm ɖe anyigba.
verses.PSA.17.12: hele adeklo dzi le avekɔe me ene.
verses.PSA.17.13: he wo ƒu anyi, eye tsɔ wò yi nàɖem le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.17.14: eye wodzraa kesinɔnuwo ɖo ɖi na wo viwo.
verses.PSA.17.15: eye ne menyɔ hekpɔ wò nɔnɔme ko la, maɖi ƒo.

verses.None: David, Yehowa ƒe dɔla, ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la. David dzi ha sia na Yehowa le esime wòɖee tso Saul kple eƒe futɔ bubuawo ƒe asi me. David gblɔ be:
verses.PSA.18.1: O! Yehowa, nye ŋusẽ, melɔ̃ wò.
verses.PSA.18.2: ƒe ŋusẽ kple nye mɔ sesẽ.
verses.PSA.18.3: eɖem tso nye futɔwo katã ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.18.4: eye nu siwo gblẽa ame la ƒo ɖe dzinye abe tɔʋu ene.
verses.PSA.18.5: blam, eye ku ƒe mɔtetrewo ɖi kpem.
verses.PSA.18.6: eye nye ɣlidodo ɖo egbɔ, ge ɖe eƒe to me.
verses.PSA.18.7: eye wodzo kpekpekpe, elabena dzi kui.
verses.PSA.18.9: eye lilikpo do blukɔ le eƒe afɔ te.
verses.PSA.18.10: Eɖo asagba ɖe ya ƒe aʋalawo dzi.
verses.PSA.18.11: si dzaa tsi lae nye agbadɔ si ƒo xlãe.
verses.PSA.18.12: eƒe mo ƒe keklẽ la me.
verses.PSA.18.13: eye Dziƒoʋĩtɔ la na wose eƒe gbe.
verses.PSA.18.14: eɖo dzikedzo ɖa, eye wòtɔtɔ wo.
verses.PSA.18.15: kple gbɔgbɔ si do tso eƒe ŋɔtime ta.
verses.PSA.18.17: ame siwo sesẽ wum akpa la ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.18.19: eɖem, elabena nye nu nyo eŋu.
verses.PSA.18.20: eye wòwɔ nyui nam le esi nye asi me dza la ta.
verses.PSA.18.21: nyemewɔ vɔ̃ hetrɔ le nye Mawu yome o.
verses.PSA.18.22: eye nyemetrɔ le eƒe ɖoɖowo yome o.
verses.PSA.18.23: eye mete ɖokuinye ɖa tso nu vɔ̃ gbɔ.
verses.PSA.18.24: kple esi nye asi me dza le eŋkume la ta.
verses.PSA.18.25: eye nèfiaa ɖokuiwò fɔmaɖilae na ame si ŋu fɔɖiɖi mele o.
verses.PSA.18.26: eye nèfiaa ɖokuiwò ayetɔe ɖe ayetɔ la ŋu.
verses.PSA.18.27: ke ame siwo si dadaŋku le la, èɖiɖia wo ɖe anyi.
verses.PSA.18.28: eye nye Mawu trɔ nye viviti wòzu kekeli.
verses.PSA.18.29: eye le nye Mawu ta mate ŋu ati kpo aflɔ gli.
verses.PSA.18.30: Enye akpoxɔnu na ame siwo tsɔe wɔ sitsoƒee.
verses.PSA.18.31: ɖe menye míaƒe Mawu la koe oa?
verses.PSA.18.32: Eyae na nye mɔ zu gbadzaa.
verses.PSA.18.33: eye wòna metea ŋu tsia tsitre ɖe teƒe kɔkɔwo.
verses.PSA.18.34: eye nye asiwo ate ŋu abɔ dati si wowɔ kple akɔbli.
verses.PSA.18.36: be nye klowo magli le tenye o.
verses.PSA.18.38: ale wodze anyi ɖe nye afɔ nu.
verses.PSA.18.39: tso ɖe ŋunye la ɖe anyi.
verses.PSA.18.41: elabena Yehowa metɔ na wo o.
verses.PSA.18.42: eye metrɔ wo ɖe mɔtata dzi abe anyi ene.
verses.PSA.18.43: eye ame siwo nyemenya o la dzie meɖu fia ɖo.
verses.PSA.18.46: Woado Mawu, nye Xɔla la, ɖe dzi bobobo!
verses.PSA.18.47: eye wòbɔbɔa dukɔwo ɖe nye afɔ te,
verses.PSA.18.48: eye nèɖem tso ŋutasẽlawo ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.18.49: le esia ta, eye madzi kafukafuha na wò ŋkɔ.
verses.PSA.18.50: eƒe amesiamina la kple eƒe dzidzimeviwo tegbee.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.19.1: eye dziŋgɔli le gbeƒã ɖem eƒe asinudɔwo.
verses.PSA.19.3: si me womese woƒe gbe le o.
verses.PSA.19.4: Etu agbadɔ ɖe dziƒowo na ɣe,
verses.PSA.19.5: Ele abe duƒula si le dzidzɔ kpɔm be wòalé eƒe mɔ atsɔ ene.
verses.PSA.19.6: naneke meɣla ɖe eƒe dzoxɔxɔ o.
verses.PSA.19.9: eye ɖikeke aɖeke mele woƒe dzɔdzɔenyenye ŋu o.
verses.PSA.19.10: kple anyitsi si woɖe le anyito me.
verses.PSA.19.11: elabena viɖe gã geɖe le wo dzi wɔwɔ me.
verses.PSA.19.12: Tsɔ nye vodada siwo metsɔ ɣla la kem.
verses.PSA.19.13: eye ŋutinye akɔ tso vodada gã me.
verses.PSA.19.14: O! Yehowa, nye Agakpe kple nye Xɔnametɔ.

verses.PSA.20.1: Yakob ƒe Mawu la ƒe ŋkɔ nanye ŋuwòdzɔla.
verses.PSA.20.2: eye wòaɖo xɔname ɖe wò tso Zion.
verses.PSA.20.4: eye wòana wò ɖoɖowo katã nadze edzi na wò.
verses.PSA.20.5: Yehowa awɔ nu siwo katã nèbiae la na wò.
verses.PSA.20.6: kple eƒe nuɖusi ƒe ŋusẽ, si wòtsɔna ɖea amee.
verses.PSA.20.7: míaƒe Mawu la ƒe ŋkɔ ŋu.
verses.PSA.20.8: ke míawo ya, míenɔa tsitre, eye míedzɔna kã.
verses.PSA.20.9: Tɔ na mí ne míeyɔ wò!

verses.PSA.21.1: Ale gbegbe wòle aseye tsom le dziɖuɖu gã siwo nènae la ta!
verses.PSA.21.2: siwo wòtsɔ eƒe nu bia la dzi nɛ.
verses.PSA.21.3: eye nètsɔ fiakuku si wowɔ kple sika nyuitɔ la ɖɔ nɛ.
verses.PSA.21.4: eƒe ŋkekewo tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me.
verses.PSA.21.5: Ètsɔ atsyɔ̃ kple bubu kɔ ɖe eya amea dzi.
verses.PSA.21.6: eye nèna dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ kple aseyetsotsoe le ŋkuwò me.
verses.PSA.21.8: eye wò nuɖusi atu wò ketɔwo.
verses.PSA.21.9: eye eƒe dzo afia wo katã.
verses.PSA.21.10: eye àtsrɔ̃ woƒe nunɔamesiwo ɖa le amegbetɔwo dome.
verses.PSA.21.12: woatrɔ ʋu me ade wò adzo.
verses.PSA.21.13: eya ta míadzi ha, eye míakafu wò ŋusẽ.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la, ne woadzi ɖe “Zinɔ le ŋdi kanyaa” ƒe gbeɖiɖi nu.
verses.PSA.22.1: eye nète ɖa xaa tso nye hũɖeɖe gbɔ?
verses.PSA.22.3: fiazikpui nènɔ anyi ɖe edzi gli.
verses.PSA.22.4: woka ɖe dziwò, eye nèɖe wo.
verses.PSA.22.5: dziwòe woka ɖo, eye ŋu mekpe wo o.
verses.PSA.22.6: elabena amewo ɖu fewu le ŋunye, eye wodo vlom.
verses.PSA.22.7: woflɔa dzu ɖe dzinye, eye woʋuʋua ta ɖe ŋunye gblɔna be:
verses.PSA.22.8: Yehowa neɖee, elabena eƒe nu nyo eŋu.”
verses.PSA.22.9: eye le danye ƒe no nu ke, èna meka ɖe dziwò.
verses.PSA.22.10: ke, eye tso ɖevime wotsɔm de asi na wò.
verses.PSA.22.11: eye ame aɖeke meli axɔ nam o.
verses.PSA.22.13: abe dzata si le gbe tem hele nu si wòlé la vuvum ene.
verses.PSA.22.14: Nye dzi lolõ ɖe dɔ me nam gbanaa hesi to menye.
verses.PSA.22.15: elabena ètsɔm mlɔ ku ƒe ʋuʋudedi me.
verses.PSA.22.16: eye wotsɔ nu ŋɔ nye asiwo kple afɔwo.
verses.PSA.22.17: eye wokpɔ dzidzɔ le nye anyidzedze ŋuti.
verses.PSA.22.18: eye woda akɔ ɖe nye awu ʋlaya dzi.
verses.PSA.22.19: O! Nye ŋusẽ, va kaba nàɖem.
verses.PSA.22.20: eye ɖe nye agbe xɔasi la tso avuwo ƒe ŋusẽ me.
verses.PSA.22.21: eye nàɖem le towo ƒe dzowo nu.
verses.PSA.22.22: eye le amehawo dome, makafu wò.
verses.PSA.22.23: Misroe ɖa, mi Israel ƒe dzidzimeviwo!
verses.PSA.22.24: ke boŋ eɖo to eƒe ɣlidodo na kpekpeɖeŋu.
verses.PSA.22.25: le ame siwo vɔ̃a wò la ŋkume.
verses.PSA.22.27: ava de ta agu ɖe eŋkume.
verses.PSA.22.28: eye wòɖu fia ɖe dukɔwo dzi.
verses.PSA.22.29: eye woyi ɖe ke ƒe tume la adze klo ɖe eŋkume.
verses.PSA.22.30: woagblɔ nya na wo tso Aƒetɔ la ŋuti.

verses.PSA.23.2: eye wòkplɔm yi tɔʋu fafɛwo gbɔe,
verses.PSA.23.3: mɔwo dzi le eƒe ŋkɔ la ta.
verses.PSA.23.5: Èsi ami ɖe ta nam, nye kplu yɔ gbagba.
verses.PSA.23.6: eye manɔ Yehowa ƒe aƒe me ɖaa.

verses.PSA.24.1: xexea me kple emenɔlawo katã nye Yehowa tɔ.
verses.PSA.24.2: eye wòɖo egɔme anyi ɖe tɔsisiwo dzi gli.
verses.PSA.24.3: Ame kae atsi tsitre ɖe eƒe kɔkɔeƒe la?
verses.PSA.24.4: eye mekaa aʋatso heta nu dzodzro o.
verses.PSA.24.5: eƒe Ɖela la, atso afia nɛ.
verses.PSA.24.7: ne Ŋutikɔkɔefia la nage ɖe eme.
verses.PSA.24.8: Yehowa si wɔa kalẽ le aʋagbedzi lae.
verses.PSA.24.9: ne Ŋutikɔkɔefia la nage ɖe eme.
verses.PSA.24.10: Yehowa Ŋusẽkatãtɔ lae nye Ŋutikɔkɔefia la.

verses.PSA.25.1: wòe mekɔ nye luʋɔ ɖe dzi na.
verses.PSA.25.2: alo nàɖe mɔ nye futɔwo naɖu dzinye o.
verses.PSA.25.3: gake ŋu akpe ame siwo nye vivimenuwɔlawo.
verses.PSA.25.5: eye nye mɔkpɔkpɔ le mewò ŋkeke blibo la katã.
verses.PSA.25.8: eya ta efiaa eƒe mɔ nu vɔ̃ wɔlawo.
verses.PSA.25.10: ame siwo léa eƒe nubablamenyawo ɖe asi.
verses.PSA.25.11: tsɔ wo kem le wò ŋkɔ la ta.
verses.PSA.25.12: Afia nu wo le mɔ si woato la dzi.
verses.PSA.25.13: eye woƒe dzidzimeviwo anyi anyigba la ƒe dome.
verses.PSA.25.14: eye wòɖea eƒe nubabla fiaa wo.
verses.PSA.25.15: elabena eya koe aɖe nye afɔ le mɔ me.
verses.PSA.25.16: elabena metsi akogo, eye hiã tum.
verses.PSA.25.17: na vovom tso nye vevesesewo me.
verses.PSA.25.18: eye nàɖe nye nu vɔ̃wo katã ɖa.
verses.PSA.25.19: eye nàkpɔ ale si wolé fum ɖikaɖikae ɖa!
verses.PSA.25.20: megana ŋu nakpem o, elabena mewòe mebe ɖo.
verses.PSA.25.22: ɖe Israel tso woƒe xaxawo katã me.

verses.PSA.26.2: eye nàdzro nye dzi kple tamesusu hã me,
verses.PSA.26.3: eye mezɔna le wò nyateƒe la me ɣe sia ɣi.
verses.PSA.26.4: alo ade ha kple alakpanuwɔlawo o.
verses.PSA.26.5: eye megbe be nyemanɔ ame vɔ̃ɖiwo dome o.
verses.PSA.26.6: eye meƒo xlã wò vɔsamlekpui, O! Yehowa,
verses.PSA.26.7: kple ɣli le nukudɔ siwo katã nèwɔ la xlẽm fia.
verses.PSA.26.9: kple nye agbe kpe ɖe hlɔ̃dolawo ŋuti,
verses.PSA.26.10: eye woƒe nuɖusime yɔ fũu kple zãnuxɔxɔ o.
verses.PSA.26.11: eya ta ɖem, eye nàkpɔ nublanui nam.
verses.PSA.26.12: Makafu Yehowa le takpekpe gã la me.

verses.PSA.27.4: eye madii le eƒe gbedoxɔ me.
verses.PSA.27.5: eye wòakɔm aɖo agakpe kɔkɔ aɖe dzi.
verses.PSA.27.6: Madzi ha, eye maƒo saŋku na Yehowa.
verses.PSA.27.7: kpɔ nublanui nam, eye nàtɔ nam.
verses.PSA.27.9: mègagbe nu le gbɔnye alo agblem ɖi o.
verses.PSA.27.11: le ame siwo tem ɖe to la ta.
verses.PSA.27.12: ame siwo lɔ ŋutasesẽ ƒe gbɔgbɔtsixɛ ɖe ƒo la ŋuti.

verses.PSA.28.1: manɔ abe ame siwo yi aʋlime la ene.
verses.PSA.28.2: ne meyɔ wò be nàxɔ nam.
verses.PSA.28.3: gake vɔ̃ɖivɔ̃ɖi le woƒe dzi me.
verses.PSA.28.4: eye nàgbugbɔ tohehe si wodze na la ahe va wo dzii.
verses.PSA.28.5: eye màgbugbɔ wo atu akpɔ gbeɖe o.
verses.PSA.28.7: eye mada akpe nɛ to hadzidzi me.
verses.PSA.28.8: ɖeɖe ƒe mɔ sesẽ wònye na eƒe amesiamina.
verses.PSA.28.9: nànye woƒe kplɔla, eye nàkɔ wo ɖe akɔnu tegbetegbe.

verses.PSA.29.1: mitsɔ ŋutikɔkɔe kple ŋusẽ na Yehowa.
verses.PSA.29.2: misubɔ Yehowa le eƒe kɔkɔenyenye ƒe atsyɔ̃ me.
verses.PSA.29.3: eye Yehowa ɖe gbe le tsi gãwo dzi.
verses.PSA.29.4: eye ŋutikɔkɔe nye Yehowa ƒe gbe.
verses.PSA.29.5: Yehowa ƒe gbe ŋe Lebanon ƒe sedatiwo.
verses.PSA.29.6: eye Sirion hã abe tovi ene.
verses.PSA.29.7: Yehowa ƒe gbe ke dzo mia abe dzikedzo ene.
verses.PSA.29.10: Woɖo Yehowa fia tso mavɔ me yi mavɔ me.
verses.PSA.29.11: eye wòyraa eƒe amewo kple ŋutifafa.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na gbedoxɔ la ŋutikɔkɔ.
verses.PSA.30.1: eye mèna mezu nu ɖikokoe na nye futɔwo o.
verses.PSA.30.2: mebia kpekpeɖeŋu tso gbɔwò, eye nèyɔ dɔm.
verses.PSA.30.4: eye mikafu eƒe ŋkɔ kɔkɔe la.
verses.PSA.30.5: gake aseyetsotso ava le ŋdi me.
verses.PSA.30.8: Yehowae medo ɣli na be wòakpɔ nublanui nam.
verses.PSA.30.11: èɖe akpanya le ŋutinye hetsɔ dzidzɔkpɔkpɔ do nam,

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.31.1: ɖem le wò dzɔdzɔenyenye la ta.
verses.PSA.31.3: elabena wòe nye nye agakpe kple mɔ sesẽ.
verses.PSA.31.4: elabena wòe nye nye mɔ sesẽ.
verses.PSA.31.6: ke nye la meku ɖe Yehowa ŋu.
verses.PSA.31.7: elabena èkpɔ nye hiã henya nye luʋɔ ƒe nuxaxa.
verses.PSA.31.8: ke boŋ èɖo nye afɔ gbadzaƒe.
verses.PSA.31.9: eye konyifafa na nye luʋɔ kple ŋutilã gbɔdzɔ.
verses.PSA.31.10: eye nye ƒuwo hã nyunyɔ ɖe lãme nam.
verses.PSA.31.11: eye ame siwo do gom le mɔtata dzi la sina le nunye.
verses.PSA.31.13: eye woɖo nugbe be yewoaɖe nye agbe ɖa.
verses.PSA.31.15: le yonyeme tim la ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.31.16: ɖem le wò lɔlɔ̃ si meʋãna o la ta.
verses.PSA.31.17: eye ɖoɖoe nazi le wo nu le yɔme.
verses.PSA.31.18: kple ɖekematsɔleme gblɔa nya vlo ɖe ame dzɔdzɔe ŋu.
verses.PSA.31.19: si wò tso dzi le amewo ƒe ŋkume la lolo.
verses.PSA.31.21: le esime mele du si ŋu woƒu kpo ɖo la me.
verses.PSA.31.22: esi meyɔ wò be nàxɔ nam.

verses.PSA.32.1: eye wotsyɔ nu eƒe nu vɔ̃wo dzi.
verses.PSA.32.2: eye alakpa mele eƒe gbɔgbɔ me o.
verses.PSA.32.3: nye ŋeŋe atraɖii ŋkeke blibo la katã na nye ƒuwo nyunyɔ.
verses.PSA.32.4: abe dzomeŋɔli ƒe dzoxɔxɔ mee mele ene.
verses.PSA.32.5: eye nètsɔ nye nu vɔ̃wo ƒe yomedzenuwo kem.
verses.PSA.32.6: elabena enye nyateƒe be ne tɔsisi gãwo ɖɔ la, womade wo gbɔ o.
verses.PSA.32.8: Maxlɔ̃ nu wò, eye makpɔ tawò.
verses.PSA.32.9: womate ŋu ate ɖe ŋuwò o.
verses.PSA.32.10: ame siwo ɖoa dzi ɖe eŋu la.
verses.PSA.32.11: midzi ha, mi ame siwo katã ƒe dzi le dzɔdzɔe!

verses.PSA.33.2: eye miƒo ha nɛ le ka ewo ƒe kasaŋku dzi.
verses.PSA.33.3: miƒo ha nɛ kple ŋusẽ, eye míado dzidzɔɣli.
verses.PSA.33.4: etoa nyateƒe le nu siwo katã wòwɔna la me.
verses.PSA.33.5: anyigba yɔ fũu kple eƒe lɔlɔ̃ si meʋãna o.
verses.PSA.33.6: eye eƒe numegbɔgbɔ wotsɔ wɔ wo ŋuti nuwoe.
verses.PSA.33.7: eye wòdzra tɔ goglowo ɖo ɖe nudzraɖoƒewo.
verses.PSA.33.8: eye xexemetɔwo katã nede bubu eŋu.
verses.PSA.33.9: eɖe gbe, eye wòli ke goŋgoŋgoŋ.
verses.PSA.33.11: eye eƒe dzimesusuwo li tso dzidzime yi dzidzime.
verses.PSA.33.12: ame siwo wòtia be woanyi yeƒe dome.
verses.PSA.33.14: ame siwo katã le anyigba dzi,
verses.PSA.33.15: eye wòléa ŋku ɖe nu sia nu si wowɔna la ŋu.
verses.PSA.33.16: eye ŋusẽ triakɔ hã meɖea kalẽtɔ o.
verses.PSA.33.18: eƒe lɔlɔ̃ si meʋãna o la dzi,
verses.PSA.33.19: eye wòana woatsi agbe le dɔŋɔli.
verses.PSA.33.20: eyae nye míaƒe xɔname kple akpoxɔnu.
verses.PSA.33.21: elabena mieka ɖe eƒe ŋkɔ kɔkɔe la dzi.

verses.None: David ƒe ha. Ekpa ha sia esime wòdo aɖaʋatɔ eɖokui le Abimelek ŋkume, eye wònyae wòdzo.
verses.PSA.34.1: eye eƒe kafukafu anɔ nye nu me ɖaa.
verses.PSA.34.2: ame siwo le veve sem la nesee ne woakpɔ dzidzɔ.
verses.PSA.34.3: mina míawɔ ɖeka ado eƒe ŋkɔ ɖe dzi.
verses.PSA.34.4: Meyɔ Yehowa, eye wòtɔ nam heɖem tso nye vɔvɔ̃wo katã me.
verses.PSA.34.5: ŋukpe matsyɔ mo na wo o.
verses.PSA.34.6: heɖee le eƒe xaxawo katã me.
verses.PSA.34.7: ame siwo vɔ̃nɛ, eye wòɖea wo.
verses.PSA.34.8: woayra ŋutsu si be ɖe eya amea me.
verses.PSA.34.9: elabena naneke mehiãa ame siwo vɔ̃nɛ la o.
verses.PSA.34.10: gake ame siwo dia Yehowa ya la, kesinɔnu aɖeke mahiã wo o.
verses.PSA.34.12: eye miedi be miakpɔ ŋkekenyui geɖewo la,
verses.PSA.34.13: eye miaƒe nuyiwo tso aʋatsokaka ŋuti.
verses.PSA.34.15: eye eƒe towo le woƒe ɣlidodo ŋu;
verses.PSA.34.16: le anyigba dzi, eye womagaɖo ŋku wo dzi akpɔ o.
verses.PSA.34.17: Yehowa see, eye wòɖe wo le woƒe xaxawo katã me.
verses.PSA.34.18: eye wòɖea ame siwo ƒe gbɔgbɔ wogbã ƒu anyi.
verses.PSA.34.19: gake Yehowa ɖenɛ le wo katã me;
verses.PSA.34.20: eye womaŋe wo dometɔ aɖeke o.
verses.PSA.34.21: eye woabu fɔ ame dzɔdzɔewo ƒe futɔwo.
verses.PSA.34.22: eye womabu fɔ ame siwo katã sinɛ tsona la o.

verses.PSA.35.1: wɔ aʋa kple ame siwo le aʋa wɔm kplim.
verses.PSA.35.2: Tso, tsɔ akpoxɔnu kple wò akɔtatsyɔnu, eye nàxɔ nam.
verses.PSA.35.4: gbegblẽ netrɔ va woawo ŋutɔ dzi.
verses.PSA.35.5: eye Yehowa ƒe dɔla nenya wo ɖe du nu;
verses.PSA.35.6: eye Yehowa ƒe dɔla neti wo yome.
verses.PSA.35.7: gake woɖo ɖɔ ɖi nam, eye woɖe ʋe ɖi nam ta la,
verses.PSA.35.8: eye woage dze ʋe si woɖe ɖi nam la me aƒaƒã ɖe afi ma.
verses.PSA.35.9: eye wòadzɔ dzi le eƒe xɔname ŋuti.
verses.PSA.35.10: ame siwo ha wo la ƒe asi me.”
verses.PSA.35.11: siwo ŋuti nyemenya naneke le o.
verses.PSA.35.12: eye wogble nye luʋɔ ɖe nuxaxa me.
verses.PSA.35.13: Ne womeɖo nye gbedodoɖa ŋuti nam o la,
verses.PSA.35.14: Medea mo to abe danye ƒe ku fam mele ene.
verses.PSA.35.16: eye woɖua aɖukli ɖe ŋunye abe mawumavɔ̃lawo ene.
verses.PSA.35.17: ɖe nye agbe xɔasi tso dzata siawo ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.35.18: eye makafu wò le ame gbogbowo dome.
verses.PSA.35.19: nate ŋku ɖem kple vevesese o.
verses.PSA.35.20: ame siwo le anyigba dzi kpoo la ŋuti.
verses.PSA.35.21: “Ɛhɛ̃! Ɛhɛ̃! Míawo ŋutɔ míekpɔe kple míaƒe ŋkuwo.”
verses.PSA.35.22: O! Aƒetɔ, mèganɔ adzɔge nam o.
verses.PSA.35.24: mègana woakpɔ dziɖuɖu ƒe dzidzɔ ɖe ŋutinye o.
verses.PSA.35.26: nata ŋukpe kple vlododo abe avɔ ene.
verses.PSA.35.27: ƒe dedinɔnɔ ŋu la ɖe dzi.”

verses.None: David, Yehowa ƒe dɔla, ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.36.1: Mawuvɔvɔ̃ aɖeke mele woƒe ŋkuwo me o.
verses.PSA.36.2: alo wòagbe nu le egbɔ o.
verses.PSA.36.4: eye megbea nu si nye nu gbegblẽ o.
verses.PSA.36.5: eye wò nuteƒewɔwɔ tɔ dziŋgɔli ke.
verses.PSA.36.6: O! Yehowa, èkpɔa amegbetɔwo kple lãwo siaa ta.
verses.PSA.36.7: le wò aʋala ƒe vɔvɔli te.
verses.PSA.36.8: eye nènaa tsi wo wonona tso wò dzidzɔtɔsisi la me.
verses.PSA.36.9: eye wò kekeli mee míekpɔa kekeli le.
verses.PSA.36.10: ame siwo ƒe dzi to mɔ ɖeka.
verses.PSA.36.11: alo ame vɔ̃ɖiwo ƒe asi nanyam o.
verses.PSA.36.12: wotutu wo ƒu anyi, eye womete ŋu fɔ o!

verses.PSA.37.1: alo aʋã ŋu nu tovo wɔlawo o
verses.PSA.37.2: eye abe gbe mumu ene la, woaku wo atsɔ aƒu gbe.
verses.PSA.37.3: nɔ anyigba la dzi, eye nàɖu eƒe nu nyuiwo le dziɖeɖi me.
verses.PSA.37.4: siwo wò dzi di la wò.
verses.PSA.37.5: ɖo dzi ɖe eŋu, eye awɔ esia na wò.
verses.PSA.37.6: eye wò dzɔdzɔenyenye ƒe mɔ abe ŋdɔkutsuɣe ene.
verses.PSA.37.8: elabena nu vɔ̃ɖi me ko wòakplɔ wò ayii.
verses.PSA.37.9: Yehowa me la, anyi anyigba la ƒe dome.
verses.PSA.37.10: togbɔ be àdi wo hã la, màkpɔ wo o.
verses.PSA.37.11: eye dzi adzɔ wo le ŋutifafa gbogbo la ta.
verses.PSA.37.12: ame dzɔdzɔewo ŋu heɖu aɖukli ɖe wo ŋuti.
verses.PSA.37.13: elabena enya be woƒe ŋkeke la gbɔna.
verses.PSA.37.14: eye woawu ame siwo ƒe zɔzɔme to mɔ ɖeka.
verses.PSA.37.16: kesinɔnu gbogbo siwo le ame vɔ̃ɖiwo si,
verses.PSA.37.17: ke Yehowa alé ame dzɔdzɔewo ɖe te.
verses.PSA.37.18: eye woƒe domenyinu anɔ anyi tegbetegbe.
verses.PSA.37.19: le dɔŋɔli la, nuɖuɖu ado agbogbo na woawo ya.
verses.PSA.37.21: ke ame dzɔdzɔe ya naa nu faa.
verses.PSA.37.22: ke ame siwo wòƒo fi de la, woaɖe wo ɖa.
verses.PSA.37.24: elabena Yehowa tsɔ eƒe asi lée ɖe te.
verses.PSA.37.25: alo wo viwo nabia abolo hafi aɖu o.
verses.PSA.37.26: eya ta wo viwo axɔ yayra.
verses.PSA.37.28: ke ame vɔ̃ɖi ƒe dzidzimeviwo ya woatsrɔ̃ wo.
verses.PSA.37.30: eye eƒe aɖe gblɔa nu si le eteƒe.
verses.PSA.37.31: eya ta eƒe afɔ meɖiɖina o.
verses.PSA.37.33: alo wòaɖe mɔ be, woabu fɔ wo ne wokplɔ wo va ʋɔnui o.
verses.PSA.37.34: Ne woatsrɔ̃ ame vɔ̃ɖiwo la, àkpɔ eteƒe.
verses.PSA.37.35: abe ati dama si dzɔ kple anyigba la ene.
verses.PSA.37.36: togbɔ be medii hã la, nyemeke ɖe eŋuti o.
verses.PSA.37.37: elabena ŋgɔgbe li na ŋutifafamewo katã.
verses.PSA.37.38: eye woaɖe ame vɔ̃ɖi la ɖa.
verses.PSA.37.39: eye eyae nye woƒe mɔ sesẽ le xaxaɣeyiɣiwo me.

verses.PSA.38.1: alo ahe to nam le wò dɔmedzoe helĩhelĩ me o,
verses.PSA.38.2: eye wò asi sẽ ɖe dzinye.
verses.PSA.38.3: nye ƒuwo tugu le nye nu vɔ̃ ta.
verses.PSA.38.4: nyemate ŋu atsɔ o la ene.
verses.PSA.38.5: le nye bometsitsi ƒe nu vɔ̃ ta.
verses.PSA.38.6: eye ŋkeke blibo la, mele yiyim le nuxaxa me.
verses.PSA.38.7: eye ŋusẽ aɖeke megale nye ameti blibo la ŋu o.
verses.PSA.38.8: eye mele ŋeŋem le nye dzi ƒe vevesese ta.
verses.PSA.38.9: eye nye hũɖeɖewo meɣla ɖe wò o.
verses.PSA.38.10: ŋusẽ vɔ le ŋunye, eye nyemegate ŋu le nu kpɔm o.
verses.PSA.38.11: eye nye aƒelikawo hã le adzɔge nam.
verses.PSA.38.12: ŋkeke blibo la wole ɖoɖo wɔm ɖe alakpadada ŋu.
verses.PSA.38.13: eye mele abe aɖetututɔ si mate ŋu aƒo nu o la ene.
verses.PSA.38.14: kple ame si mate ŋu atsɔ eƒe nu aɖo nya aɖeke ŋu o la ene.
verses.PSA.38.15: O! Aƒetɔ, nye Mawu, atɔ nam godoo.
verses.PSA.38.16: alo woado wo ɖokui ɖe dzi ɖe ŋutinye ne nye afɔ ɖiɖi o.”
verses.PSA.38.17: eye nye vevesese la le edzi ɖaa.
verses.PSA.38.18: eye nye nu vɔ̃ ɖe fu nam.
verses.PSA.38.19: eye ame siwo lé fum susumanɔmetɔe la sɔ gbɔ ŋutɔ.
verses.PSA.38.20: esi meti nu si nyo la yome.
verses.PSA.38.21: O! Nye Mawu, mèganɔ adzɔge nam o.

verses.PSA.39.2: nye vevesese do ga ɖe edzi.
verses.PSA.39.3: tete meƒo nu kple nye aɖe.
verses.PSA.39.4: eye na manya ale si nye agbe le du dzii.
verses.PSA.39.5: Amegbetɔ ɖe sia ɖe ƒe agbe le abe ƒuƒu ko ene.
verses.PSA.39.6: gake menya ame si ƒe asi me woayi ɖo o.
verses.PSA.39.8: eye mègawɔm mazu alɔmeɖenu na yakamewo o.
verses.PSA.39.10: wò asi va dzinye kple ŋusẽ ale metsi anyigba.
verses.PSA.39.11: ale amegbetɔ ɖe sia ɖe le abe ƒuƒu ko ene.
verses.PSA.39.12: abe ale si fofonyewo katã nɔ ene.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.40.1: etrɔ ɖe ŋutinye, eye wòse nye ɣlidodo.
verses.PSA.40.2: eye wòna meli ke ɖe afi si metɔ ɖo.
verses.PSA.40.3: woavɔ̃e, eye woaɖo dzi ɖe Yehowa ŋu.
verses.PSA.40.4: alo kplɔa ame siwo dze alakpalegbawo yome o.
verses.PSA.40.6: ke boŋ èʋu nye towo be mase wò gbe,
verses.PSA.40.7: agbalẽ mee woŋlɔe ɖo tso ŋutinye.
verses.PSA.40.8: O! Nye Mawu, woŋlɔ wò se la ɖe nye dzi me.”
verses.PSA.40.9: eye abe ale si nènya ene la, nyememia nye nu o.
verses.PSA.40.10: kple wò nyateƒe la ɖe ameha gã la o.
verses.PSA.40.11: ke boŋ na be wò lɔlɔ̃ kple wò nyateƒe nakpɔ tanye ɖaa,
verses.PSA.40.15: “Ehɛ̃! Ehɛ̃!” la ƒe ŋukpe newɔ moya na wo.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.41.2: eye matsɔe ade asi na eƒe futɔwo ƒe didi o.
verses.PSA.41.4: elabena mewɔ nu vɔ̃ ɖe ŋuwò.”
verses.PSA.41.5: “Ɣe ka ɣi gɔ̃e wòle kuku ge ne eƒe ŋkɔ natsrɔ̃?”
verses.PSA.41.7: eye wole nu vɔ̃ɖiwo susum tso ŋutinye le gbɔgblɔm be,
verses.PSA.41.8: magatso le afi si wòmlɔ la akpɔ gbeɖe o.”
verses.PSA.41.9: eye wòɖua nu kplim la kɔ eƒe afɔkpodzi dzi ɖe ŋutinye.
verses.PSA.41.10: kɔm ɖe dzi be maɖo teƒe na wo.
verses.PSA.41.11: elabena nye ketɔ meɖu dzinye o.
verses.PSA.41.12: eye nètsɔm ɖo wò ŋkume tegbetegbe.

verses.None: Korah ƒe viwo ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la.
verses.PSA.42.1: O! Mawu, nenemae nye luʋɔ le diwòm.
verses.PSA.42.2: Ɣe ka ɣi mayi aɖado go Mawu?
verses.PSA.42.6: le Hermon tame ke kple Mizar to dzi.
verses.PSA.42.7: wò tsitsotsoewo kple tsi kpakawo ŋe tsyiɔ dzinye.
verses.PSA.42.8: eye wònyea gbedodoɖa na nye agbe ƒe Mawu la.
verses.PSA.42.9: le nye futɔwo ƒe teteɖeanyi ta ɖo?”
verses.PSA.42.11: eya ame si nye nye Ɖela kple nye Mawu.

verses.PSA.43.1: ɖem tso ame vɔ̃ɖiwo kple ameblelawo ƒe asi me.
verses.PSA.43.2: le nye futɔwo ƒe teteɖeanyi ta ɖo?
verses.PSA.43.3: na woakplɔm ayi ɖe wò to kɔkɔe la dzi, afi si nènɔna.
verses.PSA.43.4: O! Mawu, nye Mawu, makafu wò kple kasaŋku.
verses.PSA.43.5: eya ame si nye nye Ɖela kple nye Mawu.

verses.PSA.44.1: mí tso nu siwo nèwɔ na wo le woƒe ɣeyiɣiwo me le blema.
verses.PSA.44.2: ke èna mía fofowo ya dzi ɖe edzi.
verses.PSA.44.4: wòe he dziɖuɖuwo vɛ na Yakob.
verses.PSA.44.5: eye to wò ŋkɔ me míenya avuzi le míaƒe futɔwo dzi.
verses.PSA.44.6: eye nye yi mehe dziɖuɖu vɛ nam o,
verses.PSA.44.7: eye nèna ŋukpe lé míaƒe adikatɔwo.
verses.PSA.44.9: azɔ la, mègadona kple míaƒe aʋakɔwo o.
verses.PSA.44.11: eye nèkaka mí ɖe dukɔwo dome.
verses.PSA.44.12: eye mèkpɔ naneke le wo dzadzra me o.
verses.PSA.44.13: eye míezu alɔmeɖenu kple nu ɖikokoe na ame siwo ƒo xlã mí.
verses.PSA.44.14: eye amewo ʋuʋua ta ɖe mía ŋu ne wokpɔ mí.
verses.PSA.44.16: elabena futɔ la ɖoe kplikpaa be yeabia hlɔ̃m.
verses.PSA.44.17: la, èna nu siawo katã va mía dzi.
verses.PSA.44.18: eye míaƒe afɔwo hã metra le wò mɔ dzi o.
verses.PSA.44.19: eye nètsɔ viviti tsiɖitsiɖi tsyɔ mía dzi.
verses.PSA.44.20: alo ke míaƒe abɔwo na dzromawu aɖe la,
verses.PSA.44.22: eye wobua mí abe alẽ siwo wokplɔ yina wuwu ge la ene.
verses.PSA.44.24: eye nèŋlɔ míaƒe hiãkame kple teteɖeanyi be ɖo?
verses.PSA.44.25: eye míaƒe ŋutilã lé ɖe anyigba.
verses.PSA.44.26: ɖe mí le wò lɔlɔ̃ si meʋãna o la ta.

verses.None: Korah ƒe viwo ƒe nufiameha si nye srɔ̃ɖeha na hɛnɔ la, ne woadzi ɖe dzogbenya ƒe gbeɖiɖi nu.
verses.PSA.45.1: eye nye aɖee nye nuŋlɔla adodoea ƒe nuŋlɔti.
verses.PSA.45.3: eye nàtsɔ wò atsyɔ̃ kple gãnyenye ata.
verses.PSA.45.4: na wò nuɖusi naɖe wò nuwɔwɔ dziŋɔwo afia.
verses.PSA.45.5: eye na dukɔwo nadze anyi ɖe wò afɔ nu.
verses.PSA.45.6: wò fiaɖuƒe la ƒe tsiamiti anye nuteƒewɔwɔ ƒe atikplɔ.
verses.PSA.45.8: Kasaŋkuwo na nèle aseye tsom le wò nyiɖufiasawo me.
verses.PSA.45.9: eye fiasrɔ̃ si do Ofir Sikanuwo la nɔ wò nuɖusime.
verses.PSA.45.10: Ŋlɔ wò dukɔ kple fofowò ƒe aƒe la be.
verses.PSA.45.11: eya ta de bubu eŋu, elabena eyae nye wò aƒetɔ.
verses.PSA.45.12: eye ŋutsu kesinɔtɔwo ava bia amenuveve tso gbɔwò.
verses.PSA.45.13: eye wotsɔ sika lé ɖe eƒe awu legbe ƒe teƒeteƒewo keŋ.
verses.PSA.45.14: eye wokplɔ wo vɛ na wò.
verses.PSA.45.15: ale woge ɖe fiasã la me.
verses.PSA.45.16: eye míawɔ wo fiaviwo le anyigba la katã dzi.
verses.PSA.45.17: eya ta dukɔwo akafu wò tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me.

verses.PSA.46.1: xɔnametɔ si li ɖaa kpli mí le xaxawo me.
verses.PSA.46.2: ne towo ho ɖadze atsiaƒu me,
verses.PSA.46.3: le eƒe howɔwɔ ta hã la, míavɔ̃ o.
verses.PSA.46.4: teƒe kɔkɔe, afi si Dziƒoʋĩtɔ la nɔna.
verses.PSA.46.5: Mawu akpe ɖe eŋu ne ŋu ke teti.
verses.PSA.46.6: ekɔ eƒe gbe dzi, tete anyigba lolo.
verses.PSA.46.7: Yakob ƒe Mawu la nye míaƒe mɔ sesẽ.
verses.PSA.46.8: miva kpɔ gbegblẽ si wòhe va anyigba dzi la ɖa.
verses.PSA.46.10: eye woadom ɖe dzi le anyigba dzi.”
verses.PSA.46.11: Yakob ƒe Mawu la nye míaƒe mɔ sesẽ.

verses.PSA.47.1: Mitso aseye ɖe Mawu ŋu kple ɣli.
verses.PSA.47.2: eyae nye Fiagã ɖe anyigba la katã dzi!
verses.PSA.47.3: eye wòtsɔ anyigbadzitɔwo de míaƒe afɔ te.
verses.PSA.47.5: Yehowa yi dzi kple kpẽ ƒe ɖiɖi.
verses.PSA.47.8: Mawu nɔ anyi ɖe eƒe fiazikpui kɔkɔe la dzi.
verses.PSA.47.9: elabena wodo eya amea ɖe dzi bobobo.

verses.PSA.48.1: le míaƒe Mawu la ƒe du me, le eƒe to kɔkɔe la dzi.
verses.PSA.48.2: Fia gã la ƒe du, si le abe Zafon to kɔkɔe la ene.
verses.PSA.48.3: eye wòɖe eɖokui fia abe eƒe mɔ sesẽ ene.
verses.PSA.48.5: ŋɔdzi lé wo eye wosi dzo.
verses.PSA.48.6: abe nyɔnu si le ku lém la ene.
verses.PSA.48.7: abe ale si ɣedzeƒeya gbã Tarsis tɔdziʋuwo ene.
verses.PSA.48.10: Wò nuɖusi ɖua fia le dzɔdzɔenyenye me.
verses.PSA.48.11: le aseye tsom le wò afiatsotso ta.
verses.PSA.48.12: mizɔ ƒo xlãe, eye mixlẽ eƒe xɔ tsralawo,
verses.PSA.48.14: eyae anye mía kplɔla yi ɖase ɖe nuwuwu.

verses.PSA.49.1: mi xexemetɔwo katã miƒu to anyi,
verses.PSA.49.3: eye nya siwo ado tso nye dzi me la ahe gɔmesese vɛ.
verses.PSA.49.4: eye mato adzo kple nye kasaŋku.
verses.PSA.49.5: ne ame vɔ̃ɖi, ameblelawo ƒo xlãm,
verses.PSA.49.6: eye wotsɔa woƒe nukpɔkpɔ gbogboawo nɔa adegbe ƒom ɖo?
verses.PSA.49.7: alo atsɔ ga aƒle etae le Mawu gbɔ o.
verses.PSA.49.8: eye ga home aɖeke made enu be
verses.PSA.49.10: eye wogblea woƒe kesinɔnuwo ɖi na ame bubuwo.
verses.PSA.49.11: eye woanye woƒe nɔƒe tso dzidzime yi dzidzime.
verses.PSA.49.12: ɖeko wòle abe gbemelã siwo tsrɔ̃na ene.
verses.PSA.49.14: eye woate ɖa xaa tso woƒe xɔ gã dranyiwo gbɔ.
verses.PSA.49.16: ne eƒe aƒe ƒe atsyɔ̃ dzi ɖe edzi la, megawɔ nuku na wò o,
verses.PSA.49.17: eƒe atsyɔ̃ gɔ̃ hã mayi yɔ me kplii o.
verses.PSA.49.18: eye amewo kafui esi nu le edzi dzem nɛ hã la,
verses.PSA.49.19: si magakpɔ agbe ƒe kekeli akpɔ o.
verses.PSA.49.20: le abe gbemelã si tsrɔ̃ la ene.

verses.PSA.50.1: anyigba la tso agudzedze va se ɖe esime ɣe ɖo to.
verses.PSA.50.2: le eƒe anidzedze blibo la me.
verses.PSA.50.3: dzo le nu bim le eŋgɔ, eye mazi ɖoɖoe o.
verses.PSA.50.4: kple anyigba ne wòadrɔ̃ ʋɔnu eƒe dukɔ,
verses.PSA.50.5: ame siwo bla nu kplim kple akpedavɔsa.”
verses.PSA.50.7: elabena nyee nye Mawu, wò Mawu la.
verses.PSA.50.8: alo numevɔsa siwo le ŋkunye me ɖaa la ta o.
verses.PSA.50.9: alo gbɔ̃wo tso wò gbɔ̃kpo me o,
verses.PSA.50.10: kple nyi siwo le togbɛ akpewo dzi.
verses.PSA.50.11: eye nuwɔwɔ ɖe sia ɖe si le gbe me la tɔnyee wonye.
verses.PSA.50.12: elabena xexea me kple nu siwo katã le eme la nye tɔnye.
verses.PSA.50.14: eye mixe miaƒe adzɔgbeɖefewo na Dziƒoʋĩtɔ la.
verses.PSA.50.15: maɖe mi, eye miade bubu ŋutinye.”
verses.PSA.50.16: alo alé nye nubabla la ɖe nu?
verses.PSA.50.17: eye nètsɔ nye nyawo ƒu gbe ɖe megbe.
verses.PSA.50.21: eye mado asi ɖe mo na wò.
verses.PSA.50.22: eye ame aɖeke maxɔ wò le asinye o.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la. Ekpa ha sia esime wòwɔ ahasi kple Batseba, eye Nyagblɔɖila Natan va egbɔ.
verses.PSA.51.1: Le wò dɔmenyo sɔgbɔ la nu, tutu nye dzidadawo ɖa.
verses.PSA.51.2: ŋunye nakɔ tso nye nu vɔ̃wo me.
verses.PSA.51.3: eye nye nu vɔ̃wo le nye ŋkume ɖaa.
verses.PSA.51.4: eye ne ètso afia la, woagblɔ be ele eteƒe.
verses.PSA.51.5: eye nu vɔ̃ me danye fɔ nye fu ɖo.
verses.PSA.51.7: le tsi nam, eye mafu tititi wu aklala.
verses.PSA.51.8: ne nye ƒu siwo nèŋe la nakpɔ dzidzɔ.
verses.PSA.51.9: eye nàtutu nye vodadawo katã ɖa.
verses.PSA.51.10: eye nàgbugbɔ gbɔgbɔ si li ke la de menye.
verses.PSA.51.11: alo nàxɔ wò Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la le asinye o.
verses.PSA.51.12: eye nàna gbɔgbɔ si le klalo la be wòalém ɖe asi.
verses.PSA.51.13: eye nu vɔ̃ wɔlawo atrɔ ava gbɔwò.
verses.PSA.51.15: eye nye nu aɖe gbeƒã wò kafukafu.
verses.PSA.51.16: numevɔsa hã medoa dzidzɔ na wò o.
verses.PSA.51.17: O! Mawu, màdo vlo dzi si gbã hetugu la o.
verses.PSA.51.18: eye nàɖo Yerusalem ƒe gliwo te.

verses.PSA.52.1: wò ame si nye ŋunyɔnu le Mawu ƒe ŋkume?
verses.PSA.52.2: èle abe hɛ ɖaɖɛ ene, wò alakpatɔ.
verses.PSA.52.5: aho wò kple ke tso agbagbeawo ƒe anyigba dzi.
verses.PSA.52.7: eye wòkpɔ ŋusẽ hegblẽ ame bubuwo dome lae nye esi!”
verses.PSA.52.8: la ŋu tso mavɔ me yi ɖe mavɔ me.
verses.PSA.52.9: Makafu wò le wò ame kɔkɔewo ŋkume.

verses.None: David ƒe ha na hɛnɔ la. Woadzii ɖe nublanuigbe me.
verses.PSA.53.1: ame aɖeke meli si wɔa nu nyui o.
verses.PSA.53.2: ne wòakpɔe ɖa be ame aɖe se nu gɔme alo di Mawu hã.
verses.PSA.53.4: ava srɔ̃ nu gbe aɖe gbea?
verses.PSA.53.5: ena ŋukpe lé wo, elabena Mawu gbe wo.
verses.PSA.53.6: Yakob netso aseye, eye Israel nekpɔ dzidzɔ!

verses.PSA.54.1: tsɔ wò ŋusẽ tso afia nam.
verses.PSA.54.2: eye nàƒu to anyi ɖe nye numenyawo ŋu.
verses.PSA.54.3: ame siwo mebua Mawu ɖe naneke me o.
verses.PSA.54.4: Aƒetɔ lae nye ame si lém ɖe asi.
verses.PSA.54.5: tsrɔ̃ wo le wò nuteƒewɔwɔ ta.
verses.PSA.54.6: O! Yehowa, makafu wò ŋkɔ, elabena enyo.
verses.PSA.54.7: eye nye ŋkuwo kpɔ ale si woɖu nye futɔwo dzii.

verses.PSA.55.2: Nye tamesusuwo ɖea fu nam, eye metɔtɔna,
verses.PSA.55.3: eye wogblɔa nya vɔ̃wo ɖe ŋunye le woƒe dɔmedzoe me.
verses.PSA.55.4: ku ƒe ŋɔdzi ɖe to ɖem.
verses.PSA.55.6: anye ne madzo aɖadzudzɔ le teƒe aɖe.
verses.PSA.55.8: ate ɖe aga tso ya sesẽwo kple ahom gbɔ.”
verses.PSA.55.10: eye nugbeɖoɖo kple hiãkame le eme.
verses.PSA.55.11: ŋutasesẽ kple alakpadada medzona le eƒe ablɔ dzi o.
verses.PSA.55.12: ne ketɔe kɔ eɖokui ɖe dzi ɖe ŋunye la, mate ŋu aɣla ɖee,
verses.PSA.55.14: eye míezɔna aduadu le amehawo dome le gbedoxɔ me lae.
verses.PSA.55.15: elabena nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔ xɔ aƒe ɖe wo dome.
verses.PSA.55.17: medo ɣli le xaxame, eye wòse nye gbe.
verses.PSA.55.18: togbɔ be ame geɖewo tso ɖe ŋutinye hã.
verses.PSA.55.20: kple exɔlɔ̃wo hegblẽ kɔ ɖo na eƒe nubabla.
verses.PSA.55.21: gake wonye yi siwo woɖe le aku me lé ɖe asi.
verses.PSA.55.22: elabena mana ame dzɔdzɔe la nadze anyi akpɔ gbeɖe o.
verses.PSA.55.23: Ke nye la, wò ko dzi meka ɖo.

verses.None: David ƒe nufiameha na hɛnɔ la. Woadzii ɖe “Ahɔnɛ si dzo ɖe logoti dzi le didiƒe ke” la ƒe gbeɖiɖi nu. Ekpa ha sia esi Filistitɔwo lée le Gat.
verses.PSA.56.1: ŋkeke blibo la wole yonyeme kutɔkutɔe.
verses.PSA.56.2: eye wo dometɔ geɖewo tso ɖe ŋunye kple dada.
verses.PSA.56.3: Maka ɖe dziwò ne vɔvɔ̃ ɖom.
verses.PSA.56.4: Nu ka amegbetɔ, ŋutilã kple ʋu, awɔm ma?
verses.PSA.56.5: ɣe sia ɣi wole nugbe ɖom be woawɔ nuvevim.
verses.PSA.56.6: eye wotsi dzi ɖe nye agbetsɔtsrɔ̃ ŋuti.
verses.PSA.56.7: O! Mawu, he dukɔwo ƒu anyi le wò dɔmedzoe me.
verses.PSA.56.8: ɖe womele wò nyaŋlɔɖiwo me xoxo oa?
verses.PSA.56.9: To esia me la, manya be Mawu nye tɔnye.
verses.PSA.56.10: Yehowa ame si ƒe nya mekafu.
verses.PSA.56.11: Nu ka amegbetɔ ate ŋu awɔm?
verses.PSA.56.12: eya ta maxe adzɔgbeɖefe na wò.

verses.PSA.57.1: esime gbegblẽ la nu nava yi.
verses.PSA.57.2: Mawu si wɔa ɖoɖo si wòwɔ ɖe ŋunye la dzi.
verses.PSA.57.3: Mawu dɔ eƒe lɔlɔ̃ kple eƒe nuteƒewɔwɔ ɖa.
verses.PSA.57.4: eye woƒe aɖewo nye yi ɖaɖɛwo.
verses.PSA.57.5: na wò ŋutikɔkɔe naklẽ ɖe anyigba blibo la dzi.
verses.PSA.57.6: gake woawo ŋutɔ ge dze eme.
verses.PSA.57.7: eya ta madzi ha aƒo saŋku.
verses.PSA.57.9: eye madzi ha na wò le dukɔwo dome,
verses.PSA.57.10: yi ɖatɔ dziƒo ke, eye wò nuteƒewɔwɔ yi ɖatɔ dziŋgɔli.
verses.PSA.57.11: na wò ŋutikɔkɔe naklẽ ɖe anyigba blibo la dzi.
